products.name: Recycled Ocean Plastic Sunglasses
products.description: Look good and do good. These stylish aviator sunglasses are crafted from 100% recycled ocean plastic.

products.name: Organic Cotton Tank Top
products.description: A wardrobe staple, ethically made from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton. Soft, breathable, and kind to the planet.

products.name: Vegan Leather Watch
products.description: Classic gold-tone style meets modern ethics. This beautiful watch features a high-quality strap made from durable, cruelty-free vegan leather.

products.name: Cruelty-Free Vegan Loafers
products.description: Step out in style and compassion. These elegant loafers are crafted from premium vegan materials for a comfortable and ethical choice.

products.name: Low-Wattage Eco-Dryer
products.description: A powerful, lightweight hairdryer designed for energy efficiency. With 3 heat settings, it's perfect for everyday use and eco-conscious travel.

products.name: Hand-poured Soy Wax Candle
products.description: Create a cozy atmosphere with our lavender and eucalyptus scented candle. Hand-poured using sustainable soy wax in a reusable ceramic holder.

products.name: Himalayan Salt & Peppercorn Grinders
products.description: Elevate your meals with these stylish grinders, filled with mineral-rich Himalayan pink salt and fair-trade organic black peppercorns.

products.name: Reusable Bamboo Pantry Jar
products.description: Ditch the plastic. This 57 oz (1.7 l) glass jar with a sustainable bamboo lid is perfect for storing pasta, grains, and other pantry staples.

products.name: Fair Trade Ceramic Mug
products.description: Enjoy your morning coffee in this beautifully simple mug, handcrafted by artisans in a fair trade certified workshop.
